titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Kevin Hagan White, the Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts from 1968 to 1984.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: 2/1/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Pays tribute to the life and accomplishments of Kevin Hagan White, the Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts, from 1968 to 1984.
